1.  The learned High Court judge has convicted the accused-appellant
despite the prosecution not proving its case beyond a reasonable doubt.

witnesses adduced at the trial, therefore the conviction of the accused-
3.  The judgement was given without properly assessing the reliability and
4.  The learned High Court judge erred in not following the legal provisions
